pinyin: dan1 duan1 bao1 mei2 xi1 lei4 du2 su4
dan1 duan1 bao1 mei2 xi1 lei4 du2 su4 zhong1 du2 zheng4
containing_words.word: 單端孢霉烯類毒素中毒症

pinyin: yan2 sha1 hai3 kui2 du2 su4
rou4 du2 gan3 jun1 du2 su4

sentences.english: No antivenin was necessary in this series.
sentences.chinese: 在這一組中不需抗蛇毒素。

sentences.english: The amount of electrolyte leakage was highly related to the treating time and concentration of toxin.
sentences.chinese: 且電解質外滲的程度與毒素濃度和處理時間呈正比。

sentences.english: His senses dulled as the drug swept through his body.
sentences.chinese: 當毒素傳遍他全身時，他的感覺變得麻木了。

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗表明水生有殼動物的毒素水平提高了。

sentences.english: No laboratory analysis service for saxitoxin test in humans is currently available in Macao.
sentences.chinese: 本澳目前並無對人體中石房蛤毒素含量的實驗室檢測。

sentences.english: In each kind of food includes the massive toxin are corroding each person's health.
sentences.chinese: 各類食品裏含有的大量毒素侵蝕着每一個人的健康。

sentences.english: Poison Sense. Sense poison in 30-ft. radius .
OBJECTIVE To establish bacterial endotoxin test method for clofarabine injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立氯法拉賓注射液細菌內毒素檢查方法。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of drug on chemical degradation of lipopolysaccharide (LPS) from oral anaerobes.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估各種藥物對口腔厭氧菌內毒素的降解作用。

sentences.english: METHODS The test based on the method in 2~(nd) book of China pharmacopoeia, 2000.
sentences.chinese: 方法中國藥典2000版二部細菌內毒素檢測法。

sentences.english: Preliminary tests indicate the substance found was Ricin.
sentences.chinese: 初步測試表明，該物質是蓖麻毒素。

sentences.english: This study was aimed to establish a mouse bioassay for ciguatoxin detection.
sentences.chinese: 旨在建立西加毒素小鼠生物學檢測法。

sentences.english: A vaccine prepared from the cowpox virus and inoculated against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 牛痘苗從牛痘毒素提取的用來預防天花的疫苗。

sentences.english: Both are filled with antioxidants, which can help rid your body of toxins.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種茶都含有防老化劑，可以消除身體裏的毒素。

sentences.english: Aflatoxin can induce many kinds of diseases and do very great danger to the feeding.
sentences.chinese: 黃麴黴毒素誘發多種疾病，對養殖業造成很大的危害。

sentences.english: Creatures immune to poison or disease are immune to this effect.
sentences.chinese: 免疫毒素或疾病的生物對此效果免疫。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
to expel poison (from the system)/to detox
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
